name: Elven Court
author: GrayPockets
bootlegger: Queen, Thespian, Princess, Klaun, Imposter, and Tipi-Tipi are unreleased characters.

name: Queen
ability: If both of your neighbors are good, they learn who you are. Anyone mad about a Queen being in-play might be executed.
firstNightReminder: If both of the Queen's neighbors are good, wake them up: Show the THIS PLAYER IS token and the Queen token, then point to the Queen.

name: Thespian
ability: Each night, an evil player is given something to be "mad" about tomorrow or they die. Each night, you are given something to be "mad" about tomorrow or you die.
flavor: A true thespian who doesn't give a flying rat's ass what it is as long as it's deep, powerful, and painful, and they will dive in headfirst.
firstNightReminder: Show the written madness. Put the Thespian to sleep. Wake an evil player. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, the Thespian token, then the written madness.
otherNightReminder: Show the written madness. Put the Thespian to sleep. Wake an evil player. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, the Thespian token, then the written madness.

name: Faerie
ability: You get 3 bluffs. Each night*, choose a player: they die. You register as "the Demon" for abilities. If you die, your team loses; if only 2 players live, your team wins; even if drunk or poisoned. [No Demon, +1 Minion]
flavor: Be secret and discreet; the faerie favors are lost when not concealed.
firstNightReminder: Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token. Show 3 not-in-play good character tokens.
otherNightReminder: The Faerie chooses a player.

name: Princess
ability: When a player learns that they died, then claims to be the Princess (you must), 1 player may choose to die instead. If an evil player dies for you, your team loses.

name: Klaun
ability: Each night, choose up to 3 players. They are told that they are mad in some way, but are not.
flavor: When I see professional clowns, mimes, or people who makes balloon animals, I think of their relatives and how disappointed they must be.
firstNightReminder: The Klaun chooses up to three players. Put the Klaun to sleep. Wake each target and do whatever needs to be done to simulate them being mad.
otherNightReminder: The Klaun chooses up to three players. Put the Klaun to sleep. Wake each target and do whatever needs to be done to simulate them being mad.

name: Imposter
ability: You poison and gain the ability of the 1st in-play character that you are mad about being each day.
flavor: His concern made him even forget, for the moment, that he was but the false shadow of a king, not the substance.

name: Tipi-Tipi
ability: Each night*, a player dies. On the final night, choose a player. They are "mad" that you are not the demon or their team loses.
flavor: I know why the caged bird kills.
otherNightReminder: A player dies. If three players live, choose a player. Put the Tipi-Tipi to sleep. Wake the target. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, the Tipi-Tipi token, then point to the Tipi-Tipi.
